participant_1.background:
I'm a free spirit who enjoys the simple things in life, like wearing flip flops.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.

content.text: Hey! I just got my rejection letter from the gifted program. I'm really upset about it, but I know I'll be okay.
Hey, I'm sorry to hear that. I know how it feels to be rejected from something you really wanted. But hey, you're not alone. I got rejected from the gifted program too.
Really? That's so comforting to hear. I guess I'll just have to work harder to prove myself to everyone!
That's the spirit! I know you can do it. I'm rooting for you!
Thanks, I really appreciate it. I'm gonna go eat some ice cream to cheer me up.
That's a great idea! I love ice cream. What's your favorite flavor?
I love chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream! What's yours?
Mine is vanilla bean. It's so simple, but so delicious.
I love vanilla bean too! It's so refreshing.
Me too! It's the perfect ice cream to have on a hot day.
I know, right? It's so good.
I'm glad we can agree on something!
Me too! I'm going to go eat my ice cream now. I'll talk to you later!
